Html: Why is FCKEditor put in and not TinyMCE or even TinyFCK ?

I personally like FCK since it is a "middle-weight" and not so "light-weight". It gets most of the job done. Since I am an XHTML-compliant kind of guy, I prefer something that outputs something close to XHTML-compliant code. FreeTextBox is ridiculous in the way that they purposely do not output XHTML-compliant code. Also, FCK has an ASP.NET control that is really easy to use.
